validation.contact-invalid: Contact must be a valid mail address

confirm-alert.title: Delete repository
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to delete the repository?

help.nameHelpText: The name of the repository. This name will be part of the repository url.
help.typeHelpText: The type of the repository (e.g. Mercurial, Git or Subversion).
help.contactHelpText: Email address of the person who is responsible for this repository.
help.descriptionHelpText: A short description of the repository.
